ClassDef.Name: Seat

Properties.Name: Occupant
Properties.Description: Indicates who is currently occupying the seat.

Properties.Name: CanNPCSit
Properties.Description: Determines whether NPCs are allowed to sit on this seat or only players.

Events.Name: Sat
Events.Description: Fires when an occupant sits on the seat.

Events.Name: Vacated
Events.Description: Fires when an occupant leaves the seat.

ClassDef.Description: Seats are parts the player can sit on.
